createTitle: We can move your parcel everywhere.
createDescription: Please choose your request. If you want to send a parcel, you need to create an Order type request. If you want to deliver a parcel that has already been ordered, you should create a Delivery type request.
orderDescription: Please fill out the form below to send your parcel. All fields are required.
deliveryDescription: Please fill out the form below to deliver a parcel. All fields are required.
usernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
passwordSpecialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character
originCityMin: Origin city must be at least 2 characters
destinationCityMin: Destination city must be at least 2 characters
descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters
